title: Where is the duh duh duh duh?
review: I am watching this right now. It's not awful, but it is far from great.OK - it's an action film and I liked the bit when he leaves the phone next to the radio - but....Where is the signature tune of MI? It's just not the same without it.Hubby and I are sitting here trying to fill in the right moments with the do do do do - duh duh duh duh. But we really need the sound track.As far as I can remember the first and second film were filled with this. This is like watching James Bond without the dah dah dah dah der dah dah. You get the idea?
